abstract: African Union releases highly anticipated report on atrocities committed during ongoing civil war in South Sudan; horrors include gang rape, civilian massacres and even forced cannibalism.
lead_paragraph: A report listed brutal atrocities committed during South Sudan’s civil war, including mass rapes and burials, as well as captives’ being forced to eat human flesh and jump into fires.

headline.main: Rape and Cannibalism Cited Among South Sudan’s Horrors
headline.print_headline: Rape and Cannibalism Cited Among South Sudan’s Horrors

snippet: A report listed brutal atrocities committed during South Sudan’s civil war, including mass rapes and burials, as well as captives’ being forced to eat human flesh and jump into fires.
